amendment.description: To provide emergency disaster assistance to agricultural producers.

action.text: Amendment SA 2089 ruled out of order by the chair.
Point of order that the amendment violates the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2089.
The emergency designation within amendment SA 2089 was stricken.

Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2089 (the section within the amendment regarding an emergency designation) rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 55. Record Vote Number: 440.
Point of order that an emergency designation within the amendment violates the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2089.
Amendment SA 2089 proposed by Senator Dayton. (consideration: CR S14001-14005) To provide emergency disaster assistance to agricultural producers.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2089 proposed by Senator Dayton.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2089 (the section within the amendment regarding an emergency designation) rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 55. Record Vote Number: 440.
